display_long_description:
# Welcome to Hamster Simulator – Tiny Paws, Big Adventure VR Game!
 **Night Mode:**

The lights dim, the world gets cozy, and a glowing train circles the room as you begin your night-time hamster adventure. This relaxing, atmospheric clip showcases the calm nighttime visuals, paired with soft lighting and the magical vibe of the toy train.

[media]

**Day Mode:**

 Start your day in a softly sunlit room, surrounded by pillows, shelves, and hamster-sized obstacles. Bounce across your bed, duck under furniture, and get a feel for your playful surroundings in this calm and comfy mode.


[media]

**Daytime Room Exploration:**

 Climb up the piano, scurry along shelves, and navigate every nook of your oversized habitat freedom of movement and vertical exploration are at the heart of the gameplay. Collect tasty cherries, race against time in playful challenges, and uncover secrets hidden throughout your cozy environment.

[media]

Get ready to explore, climb, snack, and scurry like never before. Whether you're winding down at night or leaping into daytime adventures, this hamster simulator puts you in the paws of the cutest little explorer. Your giant bedroom playground is waiting let the tiny adventures begin!
